post.subject: Ember-Crowned Overlord Channel Details
post.structured_content:
[{"insert":"Dear Proxy, the Exclusive Channel "Ember-Crowned Overlord" will soon be available. Signal Search Reception Rate will be boosted for Caesar (Defense - Physical)!

[Event Duration]"},{"insert":"
","attributes":{"header":4}},{"insert":"After Version 1.2 Update – 2024/10/16 11:59:59 (server time)

[Signal Search Details]"},{"insert":"
","attributes":{"header":4}},{"insert":"During the event, limited S-Rank Agent Caesar (Defense - Physical) and A-Rank Agents Piper (Anomaly - Physical) and Anton (Attack - Electric) have significantly boosted Reception Rates!
※ The limited S-Rank Agent above will not become available in the Star-Studded Cast Stable Channel.
※ This Channel is an Exclusive Channel. The Search count for guaranteed Signals is cumulative across all Exclusive Channels but is independent of and unaffected by other types of Channels.
※ For more information on Signal Searches, please press Details at the bottom-left of the Search page.

[The Final Callback - Audition Stage]"},{"insert":"
","attributes":{"header":4}},{"insert":"• Requirements: Reach Inter-Knot Lv. 8, and unlock the Event feature in the Main Story Prologue - Intermission.
• Event Duration: After Version 1.2 Update – 2024/10/16 11:59:59 (server time)
• Event Details: You can test Agents Caesar (Defense - Physical), Piper (Anomaly - Physical), and Anton (Attack - Electric) in a test stage. After clearing each test stage for the first time, you can obtain rewards on the results page.

"},{"insert":{"image":"https://upload-os-bbs.hoyolab.com/upload/2024/09/23/0/07c81823bc58c250a2fee4a6d28869f8_2312992682292660725.png"},"attributes":{"align":"img-center","height":1080,"width":1920,"size":"4384873"}},{"insert":"
"}]
